page.title: 08CLUBS AND SOCIETIES
page.content: Bristol, Poole Arts Centre, or Stratford. There are 400 members and the membership costs Â£1.00 a year. {OTHER CLUBS }There are lots of other clubs in Sturminster Newton such as Floral, Coral, Arts, Young Farmers, Rotary, Youth Club, and different sports. There is also a small fee to pay and the separate clubs have varied age_groups. Another club is the W.I. This stands for Womens Institute. The W.I. sometimes holds competitions such as cake_baking. Sometimes they have guest_speakers on all subjects from the famine in Ethiopia, to cosmetics and flower_ arranging.The W.I. has a market. People in this have to give some of their excess produce from their farms and gardens. This is sold_off and the money is given to charity or to the WI ,
